answers.answer: Oh my gosh girl!!!! You are really having a big baby. Are they going to let him stay in there any longer? LOL Did you have gestational diabetes or what? Good Luck pushing that one out!!
Sheesh!  I wouldn't want to push that head out.  Negotiate a C - lol!  I was told that they can be way off as much as 6lbs

haha i've been so curious about that myself i think i'm gonna bug the doc for some more info. all i know is it's hard as heck pushing out a big kid ... ive had 2- 9 pounders and i'm hoping for a non-9 pounder lol

No gestational diabetes...just a big boy, LOL...OB and tech said that they  can be off by a pound or two, so they will check again at 37 weeks and give an estimate then decide if induction would be necessary. My first son was 8 pounds, so I am hoping this one will be around the same weight...I do NOT want a c-section, LOL
When I was 36 weeks pregnant - they estimated my son to be 6 and a half pounds, but 4 weeks later he was only 7 pounds 3 ounces at delivery right at 40 weeks - so they were off with him!
I'm in UK but I came out with my little girl in the 97th Percentile at 34 weeks (I'm 35+2 today)Her head was 34cm and belly 33cm and guestimate at weight was 6 pounds 7 ounces lol
My bub had a Head C of 28cm and a weight of 3'3 at 29 weeks 3 days

question: I had an u/s on Monday at 35 weeks and they estimated my little (BIG) man at 7 pounds 2 oz!!!! I still have 31 days to go!! I know that their estimates can be off by as much as a pound and a half, but come on!!! I think I have a monster in there! They put him in the 96th percentile!!! Anyone else know their baby's weight?
title: I'm having a monster!! :)
